post.author: 최덕선
post.content:
Thank you for your time this afternoon - it was a pleasure speaking with you.
It is not often that I, too get to speak with many Korean I.T. professionals.
I am forwarding the job description for the position I mentioned at Triversity.
If you know of any collegues or friends who might be interested, please have them contact me.
Thank you for your help. I hope you and I can get the chance to work together in the near future.
Kind regards,
James Lee (905) 940-0255 Ext. 224 james@w5.net
W5 Staffing Inc. 100 Allstate Parkway, Suite 302 Markham, ON L3R 6H3 Fax: (905) 940-0258 www.w5.net
============================================= Role: Possesses intimate knowledge of all design aspects of assigned product area and coordinates development work related to this product.
Location: Toronto
Key Responsibility Areas:
· Work as a key member of the team whose mandate is to ship market leading products · Design and implement strategic enhancements to international software · Gives input to the scope of projects to ensure deliverables will be met · Participate in project planning to ensure that the team can deliver outstanding projects on time · Keep current with technology and software engineering practices and passes information onto teammates · Review the design and code of other software engineers · Mentor junior software engineers · Write high quality code
Typical Activities:
· Write up design documents based upon user requirements. · Develop solid code with unit testing code based upon design documents · Participate in development status meeting, design review meeting, functional review meeting to ensure that the team can deliver outstanding products on time · Work closely with QA to resolve defects in a timely manner · Review other developers’ code to guarantee the quality of the product.
Requirements:
· Several years experience in a software development capacity (software development industry preferred) · Atl east two years of working experience with J2EE, four years of working experience with JAVA · Working knowledge of UML, preferably in a design role · In depth knowledge of several of the following technologies: JMS, JDBC, XML, EJB, Servelets · Must have experience with Microsoft SQL Server, Oracle, Sybase SQL Anywhere or other Database Management Systems · Must have experience of IBM WAS, WebLogic or other Application Servers. · Experience of Point Of Sale application, JUNIT is definitely an asset.
Additional information:
Triversity website: www.triversity.com. Please play specific attention to the section regarding Transactionware Enterprise (http://www.triversity.com/products/transactionware_ent.html), which is the product suite that Triversity is working on.
The development environment is all IBM - Java, J2EE, WebSphere, AIX, DB2/UDB, and they are getting more heavily involved in Weblogic and Tomcat Application servers as well. **Hot buttons that will push a candidate over the edge include any database management/administration/development experience, and any previous exposure to Retail and/or POS applications**
post.title: Senior Software Engineer ( 6 months contract) -from Korean agency
